import re 
from collections import Counter

my_seq1 = "ATCATCATG"
my_seq2 = "CAGCCCAATCAGGCTCTACTGCCACTAAACTTACGCAGGATATATTTACGCCGACGTACT"

def kmers(seq):
  n=len(my_seq1)
  unique_mer_list=[]
  mer_list=[]
  
  #finding mers
  mer1=re.findall(r"...", seq)
  mer2=re.findall(r"...", seq[1:n])
  mer3=re.findall(r"...", seq[2:n])
  
  #add all mers to mer_list
  for m in mer1:
    mer_list.append(m)
  for m in mer2:
    mer_list.append(m)
  for m in mer3:
    mer_list.append(m)
  
  #count instances:
  dict=Counter(mer_list)
  print(dict)
  
kmers(my_seq1)
kmers(my_seq2)
